Our mental health has sharply declined in the last 25 years and the chances that one will have behavioural problems such as lying, stealing and being disobedient, have more than doubled. The rate of emotional problems such as anxiety and depression has increased by 70% today. The male folk are more likely to exhibit behavioural problems and the female folk are more likely to suffer emotional problems. Our society breeds anxiety, depression and dysfunction. Our belief in "progress" has increased our expectations. The result is mass disappointment.

It thus becomes imperative to safeguard your emotional well-being in today\'s testing and trying times. The Mind Tuning Training Program enables you to effectively deal with your Emotional Health. It is a 60 hour Training Program based on the Principles of Rational Emotive Behaviour Therapy (R.E.B.T.) by Dr. Albert Ellis and Stress Management Techniques. The Training Program will shed light on –
The following issues will be dealt with during the Training -
Playstation Pluto - Beneficial Fun Time, Physical Play Time, De-Tech from Gadgets
Enroll your child for PLAYSTATION PLUTO if you have answered yes to any of the above and help him develop

Symptomatic expression of emotional, interpersonal and behavioural maladjustments include nail biting, enuresis (bed wetting), encopresis (fecal soiling), negativism, poor social skills, emotional impairment, changing social scenario, depression, adjustment and/or coping difficulties, anxiety, anger issues, hyperactivity, inattention, lack of concentration, overtly hostile or anti-social acts, disturbed sleep patterns, addiction to electronic gadgets and emotional disturbances.
Behavioural problems if not tackled suitably shall indeed be a great threat to the individual and his family as well as impacts the society at large.

Individual Personal Counselling or Therapy is a guided process between you and a professional therapist. In these sessions you work towards any personal, emotional, familial, career or health related issue(s) in order to empower yourself.

We at Brainwave provide a safe, caring and confidential environment to mutually work through the challenges faced by you. We further assist you to identify the aspects of your lives that you would like to change, set personal goals and understand yourself better and most importantly to cope better with your life conditions.

You may seek therapy to cope with major life challenges and trauma, professional trials, health upheavals, relationship crisis or to deal with fears, phobias, anxiety, panic attacks, suicidal tendencies or depression to simply desiring personal growth and greater self-knowledge.

You may work with a therapist for as many sessions as you feel the need to fortify yourself. The number of sessions is unique to every individuals it determined by your personal needs and goals. However, it is recommended to take a minimum of 5 sessions for experiencing the true quintessence of counselling.

string.name: sv_content_3_5
string.b: Book a Counselling Session today and empower yourself…

resources.string: Need to talk to someone? Our Telephone & Skype Counselling service allows you to talk to a trained therapist about any issue.

Telephone & Skype Counselling helps you to discuss and explore any area of your life with a therapist over weekly sessions of 1 hour each. The number of sessions depends on the area you wish to address and your goals. This is similar to Individual face – to - face Counselling, except that the sessions are on, through telephone or Skype.

string.name: sv_content_4_3
string.b: Telephone & Skype Counselling will benefit if:

string.name: sv_content_4_4
string.b: When you choose telephone counselling, remember the following:

string.name: sv_content_4_5
string.b: Book your Counselling Sessions at a time convenient to you…

resources.string: You find it difficult to access a professional therapist in your locality.
You prefer counselling sessions over the phone.
You find it difficult to commute.
You wish to remain anonymous.
Upon making a booking, you will receive an email with the confirmation details of your appointment including our contact number.

As a client, you need to call the therapist at the scheduled time. Each session will be for one hour. If you call late, you will lose time. The therapist will end the session at the scheduled time even if you are late as they may have other clients scheduled next
After your first session, all subsequent session appointments will be given directly by the counselor.

We collect the fee in advance for your first session. To make the transaction hassle free, we recommend you to pay for 3 sessions after your first session. Your therapist will guide you if you have questions or concerns.
The payment instructions for subsequent sessions will be communicated by your therapist
Ensure you are in a noise free environment to enhance the effectiveness of the sessions

Career Counseling is a process that will help you to know and understand yourself and the world of work in order to make career, educational, and life decisions. Career development is more than just deciding on a major and what job you want to get when you graduate.
Career is encompassing an individual\'s life as it determines not only his/her job but financial as well as social status, lifestyle, . It is the core of human life.

A couple of decades ago, the best career options a student had to choose were as easy as doctor, lawyer, engineer or a businessperson. Neither the child nor the family had to spend more time, energy or resources to worry about the appropriate career. It was indeed a cakewalk. However, with growing competition and with the world transforming into a global village, it soon became imperative to make an apt career choice. Along with the wide variety one could choose from, there were immense changes in the World of Work. Scores of careers became obsolete while voluminous new ones are available making career choice a challenging task.

string.name: sv_content_5_5
string.u: Common Concerns to make Career Choice

resources.string: Now you are aware of the competitive, educational scenario of today\'s time. We all know that the impact of the career choice made today is endured lifelong. Owing to this, the youth of today experience untold confusion in order to make an apt career choice. At such a significant moment, it becomes imperative that one considers the following fundamental factors to facilitate the best career option for themselves:-
By making a career choice based on the above, it irrefutably shall pave way for a SATISFYING & SUCCESSFUL FUTURE.

The Aptitude Testing Program will help you to take the first step in transforming your dreams into reality. You will be scientifically evaluated and the result will help you to become aware of your interest, skills and personal qualities.
"I have no idea what I want to do with my life."
"I don't know what to major in."
"I've narrowed it down to a couple career options, but I'm having a hard time choosing between them."
"I know what I want to major in, but I have no idea what I want to do once I graduate."
"I know what I want to do, but I'm not sure what the best major would be."
"I want to know what kinds of jobs I can get with my major."
"I don't feel like I know enough about all the different careers out there to know what I want to do."
"I like a lot of different subjects, and I keep changing my choice because I'm not sure which one is the best for me!"
"I don't like any of my classes and none of the subjects seem really appealing to me."
"I have a lot of work experience and I want to find a new career path that will build on the skills I already have."
"I was planning on going into the _______ program, but I applied and didn't get in. What do I do now?"
"My family really wants me to be a _______, but I'm not sure if that's really what I want."
"I've always planned on being a _______, but I'm wondering if it's only because that's all I know."
"I want to find a field to go into where there will always be plenty of jobs."
"I want to find a career that will allow me to provide significant financial support for my family."

The Bach Flower Remedies is a safe and natural method of healing, discovered by Dr. Edward Bach in England. The Bach Flower Essences are made from flowers. They gently restore the balance between mind and body by casting out negative emotions such as fear, worry, hatred and indecision which interfere with the equilibrium of the being as a whole. The Bach Flower Remedies allow peace and happiness to return to the sufferer so that the body is free to heal itself.

b.i: Bach Flower Remedies can be used in all life situations to bring about optimism, balance, calmness and harmony.

resources.string: Bach Flower Remedies (BFR) aids to handle any life situations like – new beginnings in life, failure, how to be level headed in any type of situation and face any difficulty with courage and recover easily from any setback.

It heals pain and suffering at physical, mental, emotional, spiritual levels. BFR brings about success, abundance, life skills to handle situations in personal and professional life. Flowers create harmony and help in all relationships, family, office, marriage, marital issues, creates abundance.
Bach Flower Therapy can be used to heal the following:

The Bach Flowers are pure, harmonious energy frequencies that will never have negative effects; however, symptoms may be temporarily intensified following the initiation of Bach Flower Therapy - This means that the individual may feel worse for a short time as toxins are released during a clearing process often referred to as a Healing Crisis. Such a clearing process is a positive indication that equilibrium is being restored.

string.name: sv_bull_6_4_1
string.i: Bach Flower Therapy is recognized all over the world.

string.name: sv_bull_6_4_2
string.i: Bach Flower Essences work as subtle, nonmaterial impulses.

string.name: sv_bull_6_4_3
string.i: It is a chemical free treatment.

string.name: sv_bull_6_4_4
string.i: It is useful for all kinds of psycho-somatic problems, stress, strain and for healing numerous diseases.

string.name: sv_bull_6_4_5
string.i: It can be used safely by everyone - babies, children, adults including pregnant women, animals, and plants.

string.name: sv_bull_6_4_6
string.i: Taking them is easy. The versatility of administration ensures that the remedies may be used in all situations regardless of age or capability.

string.name: sv_bull_6_4_7
string.i: They are suitable for self-healing. Their harmless effects make Bach Flower Remedies a risk free system to use in self-healing.

string.name: sv_bull_6_4_8
string.i: They are compatible with all other forms of therapy. The Bach Flower Remedies will act harmoniously with any other form of therapy, particularly holistic therapies.

string.name: sv_bull_6_4_9
string.i: They often augment other therapies. In the treatment of chronic conditions, the addition of flower remedies has often brought about a crucial positive turn of events.

string.name: sv_bull_6_4_10
string.i: They help us to avoid physical illness. Bach Flower Remedies do not act at the level of the physical body, but at the more subtle etheric levels that directly influence the human energy system.
